summary: This portfolio is calibrated for moderate risk, aiming for double-digit returns over 2 years. It blends sector-leading stocks with steady growth and defensiveness, while mutual funds add professional diversification. 32% is in stabilizers, ensuring capital safety and partial liquidity. Sectoral spread limits drawdown and taps into multiple macro trends.

risk_analysis.mild_crash: In a 10% market correction, expected temporary loss: ~₹13,600 in equity sleeve. Total portfolio drops below ₹186,000. Most conservative sectors/FD/gold soften volatility.
risk_analysis.moderate_crash: 20% equity fall would reduce equity by ~₹27,200, total value near ₹172,000. Recovery probable as fundamentals are sound.
risk_analysis.severe_crash: In a 30% drawdown, equity sleeve may drop ₹40,800; total portfolio around ₹159,000. Stabilizers (FD, gold, debt funds) cushion downside.
risk_analysis.summary: Allocation ensures even in sharp crashes, the client's wealth is partly protected. Diversifiers and sector spread help recover lost ground faster.

education_tips.diversification_importance: Spreading investments reduces risk from any single stock, sector, or asset class. Avoid concentration.
education_tips.long_term_perspective: Staying invested through short-term volatility is key to compounding returns. Avoid panic selling.
education_tips.rebalancing_strategy: Revisit allocations every 6-12 months; trim winners, add to laggards if fundamentals are sound. Adjust based on market cycle.
education_tips.understanding_risk: Every investment involves risks. Ensure chosen products match your return needs and volatility comfort. Avoid impulsive decisions.
